Title: Fallen Angel
Writer: Richard Morgan (based on the novel by), Laeta Kalogridis (created by), Steve Blackman, Nevin Densham (executive story editor), Richard Morgan (novel)
Actors: Joel Kinnaman, James Purefoy, Martha Higareda, Chris Conner
Plot: While Kovacs tracks down a man who sent Bancroft a death threat, Lt. Ortega bends the rules to keep tabs on his whereabouts.
